dict.string: #!/usr/bin/env ruby -wKU STDOUT.sync = true page = STDIN.read page.gsub!(/<\?(php|=).*?\?>|<%.*?%>/m, '') open('|curl -sF uploaded_file=@-\;type=text/html http://validator.w3.org/check', 'r+') do |io| io << page; io.close_write result = io.read result.gsub!(/<\/title>/, '\&') result.gsub!(/Line (\d+),?\s*Column (\d+)/mi) do "#$&" end puts result end
